channel.title: Comments on: Neila asks, “How do you defrag your hard drive in Windows 8.1?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Samantha D. Burris
item.dc:creator: Samantha D. Burris
item.description: Interesting content on how to defrag.. However, before anyone attempts to defrag their computer, it's important that they know why it should be done. This article http://errortools.com/blog/reasons-to-defrag-hard-drive/ provides a summary of why a defrag is important.
item.content:encoded: Interesting content on how to defrag.. However, before anyone attempts to defrag their computer, it’s important that they know why it should be done. This article http://errortools.com/blog/reasons-to-defrag-hard-drive/ provides a summary of why a defrag is important.
